C

checkIfMoveHappened(int[][], int[][]) - Method in class fi.lrkr.twos.game.Logic
Checks if move happened after it was executed by checking if any Piece moved.
checkLoss() - Method in class fi.lrkr.twos.game.Logic
Checks if the game is lost by checking if there are any possible moves left.

D

doubleValue() - Method in class fi.lrkr.twos.game.Piece
Doubles the value of a piece and increments its exponent, unless the value is 0.

E

moveDown() - Method in class fi.lrkr.twos.game.Board
Moves all the Pieces on the Board to down, combines suitable Pieces and counts score for the move.

moveUp() - Method in class fi.lrkr.twos.game.Board
Moves all the Pieces on the Board to up, combines suitable Pieces and counts score for the move.

start() - Method in class fi.lrkr.twos.game.Logic
